creditline: Gift of Richard and Roberta Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three panel huipil; white ground bands of geometric patterning in red, yellow, grey and purple; pink satin appliqué at neckline; large leaf-form embroidery surrounds appliqué; one small chicken embroidered at central lower edge.
medium: Cotton, silk; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, appliqué, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
